name: Sliding Penguins
description:
Avoid obstacles and slide as long as possible !

Avoid rocs, trees, and logs !

If you touch glass, you will speed up and get 100 points, but don't go too fast !

Controls :

If you are on a mobile device, just tap the arrows to move the pinguin !

If you are on a computer :

  • Left Arrow or A to go left
  • Right Arrow or D to go right

Tip : You can also hit Space to start the game or play again !

Music :
  • Mario Kart 64 - Frappe Snowland (Remix) by MetaMagnus
  • (Fanmade) Choco Mountain Remix by Fevirre
Made with Godotengine.
